title: Leauge has done it again!
body: So ever since the new season came out, the dreaded 'Network Warning' has come back. Still with other people that have had this and somehow concurred it, please help, because I'm stopping league until I can find a fix. I was just about to buy $50 of rp. Sucks cause I can't even use it.

replies.body: It's not very likely for a patch to affect your network stability, but there *are* a few other things that can. Windows updates can sometimes reset certain settings like port forwarding and DNS, so double check those following the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you aren't sure how. If that doesn't help, try using an ethernet connection really quick and let me know if that gives any difference.
